accueil.description: From Sambava, the vanilla capital of the SAVA region, we share with the world the authentic taste and aroma of the finest Madagascar vanilla, cultivated with passion and expertise.

intro.paragraphe1: UNM was founded in 2016 in Sambava, Madagascar, by its founder and CEO LUO MING. Driven by passion, the company was born with a unique mission: to carry the exceptional taste and aroma of Madagascar vanilla to every corner of the world.
intro.paragraphe2: In 2024, UNM reached a major milestone by exporting several tons of vanilla, ensuring stable income for around fifty workers during a particularly difficult year in Madagascar. Small but united, our team is above all a family, strengthened by years of collaboration and a shared goal.

quiSommesNous.citation: These commitments rely on a fully controlled value chain: from harvesting to international shipment, ensuring vanilla that is 100% traceable, safe, and sustainable.

piliers.description: Strict selection, controlled preparation and export meeting international standards: our vanilla meets the expectations of the most demanding markets.
Our teams combine traditional methods with modern techniques to preserve the natural aroma, texture, and unique aromatic richness of Madagascar vanilla.
We promote local work, guarantee fair income, and contribute to the development of vanilla-producing communities.

etapes.description: Vanilla takes several years to grow. It takes 3 to 4 years after planting for the first flowers to appear.
Each flower is hand-pollinated. Farmers use thin sticks to connect the male and female parts of the flower—a meticulous task that lasts only a few seconds per flower.
Nine months are needed to obtain perfectly ripe pods ready for harvest. Only the best, well-formed and fully mature ones continue the process.
Scalding, sweating, sun-drying, then curing: a long process that reveals the aroma, color, and suppleness expected from premium vanilla.
Pods are graded, sorted and packed according to international standards, then stored under optimal conditions before shipment.

services.intro: Driven by a true passion for vanilla, we master and enhance each stage after harvest—from selecting green pods to exporting them—to offer our clients authenticity, aromatic richness, and the unique craftsmanship behind each pod.
services.description: Whether you need three pods or several containers, we provide premium vanilla to everyone: consumers, food lovers, gourmet chefs, cosmetic companies, creative cooks, and actors in the food industry.

etapes.texte: Fleshy, supple, intensely fragrant pods, graded by length from 15 to 20 cm. Also known as Gourmet and TK.
Carefully cut pod pieces, perfect for infusions and preparations requiring strong aromatic power at a controlled cost.
100% natural powder made from dried vanilla pods finely ground, ideal for flavoring pastries, ice creams, and beverages.
Pure vanilla seeds extracted from the pod, ready to use, offering exceptional aromatic intensity for high-end culinary creations.

caracteristiques: Perfect suppleness: Bends without breaking, proof of optimal humidity and preserved freshness.
Fleshy and voluminous: Full, generous pods, guaranteeing high seed and aroma content.
Length and uniformity: Generally 14 to 18 cm, with consistent size reflecting ideal maturation.
Intense and complex aroma: Rich, sweet, warm vanilla fragrance expressing the finesse of natural vanillin.
Impeccable appearance: Uniform dark-brown color, slightly shiny surface, no defects or cracks, visible seeds inside.
articles.info: Store away from heat and light, in an airtight container.

caracteristiques: Exceptionally intense aroma: Seeds rich in natural vanillin, offering a deep, warm, refined fragrance ideal for gastronomy.
Fine and consistent texture: Black, shiny, uniform seeds—proof of well-matured and perfectly cured pods.
Impeccable purity: Extracted exclusively from premium pods, with no added sugar, alcohol, or artificial flavors.
Elegant, high-end visual: Small black grains add a refined touch to creams, pastries, and sauces.
Immediate aromatic power: Seeds instantly release their fragrance, allowing intense flavoring even in small quantities.
articles.info: Ideal for fine pastries, ice creams, and gourmet infusions.

engagements.description: We are a passionate and skilled team, committed to producing and exporting superior-quality vanilla while respecting our partners and the environment. Our ambition is to be a responsible, recognized player in the industry by guaranteeing products that meet international standards, are fully traceable, and have a sustainable impact.
articles: Integrity – We act with transparency and honesty in all our decisions.
Rigor – We apply high standards to guarantee the quality of our commitments.
Human development – We encourage growth and fulfillment for each team member.
Environmental respect – We work to reduce our ecological impact and protect natural resources.
Sustainable partnerships – We build strong, responsible relationships to create long-term value in the vanilla sector.
